author: bez625
content: Hey <@199561711278227457> - is it possible to create validators  on devnet 5 through the deposit contract? I submitted one a few hours ago, it said valid in the dora browser (after some failed attempts), but i cant see it as pending yet

author: parithosh
content: There's no finality on the devnet right now, afaik you need it to finalize for EIP-6110 deposits to be onboarded as validators.

author: bez625
content: Ah ok. Is there any other way I can get a validator set up? I'm trying to test vouch integration with beacon clients ahead of electra
